Monster Rancher DS = Monster Farm DS 2
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Monster Rancher DS: General QA: Monster Rancher DS = Monster Farm DS 2
By Daneasaur on Friday, December 25, 2009 - 07:10 am:

It appears Techmo is deciding to skip the first in the DS series in terms of translation and go straight for the second one.

A primary way to indentify that this is, in fact, the second one, is the monster list.

For example, the trailer lists the Gali as being one of the mosnters available, however, the Gali is NOT in Monster Farm DS 1.

By Thorr on Sunday, December 27, 2009 - 08:25 pm:

Yup. We knew that.

By Bethegus on Saturday, February 20, 2010 - 03:05 pm:

This is great! I've been waiting for a new Monster Rancher game for awhile.
